font-size.name: Font Size
font-size.hint: Default size of the damage font

max-font-scale.name: Maximum Font Scale
max-font-scale.hint: Maximum Size to scale the damage font to

top-offset.name: % offset from top of token
top-offset.hint: Offset percentage from top of token for the damage, input as whole number (IE. 70 is 70%)

jitter.name: Jitter
jitter.hint: How much the damage text will move around its spawn point (0 = doesn't move, 1 is it could spawn on the edges of the token)

number-scale-type.name: Number Scale Type
number-scale-type.hint: Scaling type for the size of the damage RPG Numbers

damage-split.name: Damage Split
damage-split.hint: How to split damage numbers from roll (None: total only, By Type: By damage type, All: Splits all terms)

debug-mode.name: Debug Mode
debug-mode.hint: Have the console receive messages for different stuff

duration.name: Text Duration
duration.hint: How long until  the damage text despawns in seconds

wait-time-between-numbers.name: Wait Time between numbers (ms)
wait-time-between-numbers.hint: How long in between each damage number should the game wait before spawning the next, in milliseconds.

show-only-GM.name: Show numbers only for GM
show-only-GM.hint: Show  the damage numbers only for the game if you like them, but not that much

animation-scale.name: Animation Scale
animation-scale.hint: How far out from the token should  the damage numbers move

show-total.name: Show Total
show-total.hint: Show total as a number in the center of the token in addition to other damage numbers

check-enabled.name: [Checks] Enable RPG Checks & Attacks
check-enabled.hint: Show number pop ups when attempting checks & attacjs

check-duration.name: Check Duration
check-duration.hint: Time for check number pop up to show

check-outcome-result.name: Choose what to show for d20 check rolls
check-outcome-result.hint: Numbers shows the d20 + mods result, outcome shows crit success, success etc., and outcome w/o combat crits shows the outcome without combat critical misses and hits meant as compatibility with pf2e animations.

check-color-scheme.name: Select check theme
check-color-scheme.hint: (Changes coloration of checks) Currently have a default theme, and a dark mode theme, will add more visibility etc. for it later

shake-enabled.name: [Shake] Enable Damage Shake
shake-enabled.hint: Shakes the screen when you apply damage using pf2e's apply damage button

shake-duration.name: Screen shake duration
shake-duration.hint: How long in to shake the screen in MS

shake-intensity-max.name: Shake Intensity
shake-intensity-max.hint: How hard to shake the screen

shake-intensity-type.name: Shake Intensity Scaling
shake-intensity-type.hint: How should screen shake intensity scale. None - just uses max value, % Current HP - scales off current HP, % Max HP - Scales off Max HP

shake-intensity-include-temp-hp.name: Should scaling include Temp HP
shake-intensity-include-temp-hp.hint: If you picked an intensity that scales off hp, toggling this on causes it to include temp hp

shake-gm-enabled.name: Enable shaking for GM
shake-gm-enabled.hint: Causes GM to experience screen shake for any actors and their tokens that don't have a player owner

dmg-shake-directional-enabled.name: [Token Shake] Enable Token shaking on damage
dmg-shake-directional-enabled.hint: When you apply damage to a token cause it to shake

rotate-on-attack.name: [Attack Rotate] Enable Token rotating on attacking
rotate-on-attack.hint: When you attack the token turns towards who it attacks, then turns back to its original rotation. You can set the rotation offset to determien where the front is
